channel.title: 718 Rune veteran - Economy
channel.description:
[SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://rune-veteran.webs.com/downloads"]Download[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://rune-veteran.webs.com/"]Website[/URL][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=5]What are we?[/SIZE][/B]
Rune veteran is a private server that is growing and growing!
Rune veteran is a constantly growing server that strives for perfection in the development stage! Once you're with Rune veteran you won't ever want to log out!
We are an economy based server with a large range of skills, bosses, minigames and a proud Pking community.
We pride ourself on being a friendly and welcoming community, our staff are friendly and committed to making you feel at home. Our servers are stable and online 100% of the time.
We are currently on VPS. Means we are online 24/7. We have 4 different xp modes , Easy , Normal , Hard , Insane.
We have fully added bandit camp ! With working god items.
Completionist cape with requirements and adventure logs!
Working clan-chat and friends-chat.
Able to recharge your dragonstone jewelerys
Loyalty points with working shops , same goes for vote and even pvm points for all your needs!
Working slayer with shop.
Working clue scrolls.
Squeel of fortune with daily spins!
Working grand exchange no search lagg
Tier 90 gear such as malovent , drygores etc.
Kiln cape ( mage , melee , range )
Full crafting (pottery crafting, urns, jewelry, glass blowing / flask making, leather crafting, spinning)
Proper herblore (all items processed automatically, overloads able to made in one process, proper potion effects) All skills able to be trained in a diverse range of ways without any duplication or process errors.
[B][SIZE=4]Minigames[/SIZE][/B] - Pest Control - Soul Wars - Castle Wars - Duel Arena - Dominion Tower - Fight Caves - Fight Kiln (with melee/ranged/mage kiln capes) - Fight Pits - Barrows - Puro Puro - Runespan
[SIZE=4]PvM Content[/SIZE] - Lucien (very difficult team boss, drops malevolent armour and noxious longbow) - Blink (requires 105 dungeoneering, drops primal weapons) - God Wars Dungeon (all requirements including Nex access with frozen key) - Seperate, instances God Wars bosses. - King Black Dragon - Kalphite Queen - Queen Black Dragon - Chaos elemental - Corporeal Beast - Dagannoth Kings - Pest Queen - Sunfreet - Glacors (fully working with glacytes) - regular, co-op and boss slayer with points and shop, task length changing and slayer helm crafting etc. - PvM points with rewards that benefit your PvM experience. - Dwarf multicannon with cannonball smithing. - Dungeoneering shop rewards nearly all 100% functional
[spoiler=Media] Bandit camp fully working [img]http://i.imgur.com/sn2Gwnu.png[/img] Working dragonstone jewerly recharging [img]http://i.imgur.com/OeHiOb8.png[/img] Different zones [img]http://i.imgur.com/i5waL9c.png[/img] Dragonbone with statistics [img]http://i.imgur.com/2WIfZlO.png[/img] Kiln capes ( melee, mage , range) [img]http://i.imgur.com/7IrkNUD.png[/img]
[/spoiler]

item.title: 718 Rune veteran - Economy
item.dc:creator: @Keyal Keyal
item.description:
@Keyal wrote:

[SIZE=5]Download[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Website[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]What are we?[/SIZE]

Rune veteran is a private server that is growing and growing!

Rune veteran is a constantly growing server that strives for perfection in the development stage! Once you’re with Rune veteran you won’t ever want to log out!

We are an economy based server with a large range of skills, bosses, minigames and a proud Pking community.

We pride ourself on being a friendly and welcoming community, our staff are friendly and committed to making you feel at home. Our servers are stable and online 100% of the time.

We are currently on VPS. Means we are online 24/7.
We have 4 different xp modes , Easy , Normal , Hard , Insane.

We have fully added bandit camp ! With working god items.

Completionist cape with requirements and adventure logs!

Working clan-chat and friends-chat.

Able to recharge your dragonstone jewelerys

Loyalty points with working shops , same goes for vote and even pvm points for all your needs!

Working slayer with shop.

Working clue scrolls.

Squeel of fortune with daily spins!

Working grand exchange no search lagg

Tier 90 gear such as malovent , drygores etc.

Kiln cape ( mage , melee , range )

Full crafting (pottery crafting, urns, jewelry, glass blowing / flask making, leather crafting, spinning)

Proper herblore (all items processed automatically, overloads able to made in one process, proper potion effects)
All skills able to be trained in a diverse range of ways without any duplication or process errors.

[SIZE=4]Minigames[/SIZE]

  • Pest Control
  • Soul Wars
  • Castle Wars
  • Duel Arena
  • Dominion Tower
  • Fight Caves
  • Fight Kiln (with melee/ranged/mage kiln capes)
  • Fight Pits
  • Barrows
  • Puro Puro
  • Runespan

[SIZE=4]PvM Content[/SIZE]

  • Lucien (very difficult team boss, drops malevolent armour and noxious longbow)
  • Blink (requires 105 dungeoneering, drops primal weapons)
  • God Wars Dungeon (all requirements including Nex access with frozen key)
  • Seperate, instances God Wars bosses.
  • King Black Dragon
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Chaos elemental
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Pest Queen
  • Sunfreet
  • Glacors (fully working with glacytes)
  • regular, co-op and boss slayer with points and shop, task length changing and slayer helm crafting etc.
  • PvM points with rewards that benefit your PvM experience.
  • Dwarf multicannon with cannonball smithing.
  • Dungeoneering shop rewards nearly all 100% functional
